param.label: connections list provided
param.name: connection_list
param.help: list of possible connections between compounds defined as formulas. Only necessary if mode='connections'.

param.name: ppm
param.label: ppm between isotopes
param.help: Maximum ppm value allowed between 2 isotopes. Default value 100.

param.name: ppmunk
param.label: ppm for unknown
param.help: ppm associated to the 'unknown' annotation. If not provided equal to ppm.

param.name: ratiounk
param.label: isotope ratio for unknown
param.help: isotope ratio associated to the 'unknown' annotation.

param.name: ratiosd
param.label: intensity ratio
param.help: acceptable ratio between predicted intensity and observed intensity of isotopes

param.name: ppmthr
param.label: ppm threshold
param.help: maximum ppm possible for the annotations. if not provided equal to 2*ppm.

param.name: pRTNone
param.label: no RT factor
param.help: multiplicative factor for the RT if no RTrange present in the database.

param.name: pRTout
param.label: outside RT factor
param.help: multiplicative factor for the RT if measured RT is outside the RTrange present in the database.

param.label: Mapped isotope patterns
param.name: mapped_isotope_patterns
param.help: A csv file containing the MS1 data. Ideally obtained from map_isotope_patterns.

param.label: annotations
param.name: annotations
param.help: pandas dataframe containing all the possible annotations for the measured features.

param.label: gibbs sampler iterations
param.name: noits
param.help: number of iterations if the Gibbs sampler to be run.

param.label: ignored iterations
param.name: burn
param.help: number of iterations to be ignored when computing posterior probabilities. If None, is set to 10% of total iterations.

param.label: output Gibbs parameter
param.name: all_out
param.help: logical value. If true the list of assignments found in each iteration is returned by the function. Default False.

param.label: previous Gibbs sampler
param.name: zs
param.help: list of assignments computed in a previous run of the Gibbs sampler. Optional, default None.
